# Security Policy

If you discover a security vulnerability, please responsibly disclose it.

## Reporting

- Email: csmathguy+security@gmail.com (update with your contact)
- Preferred: Open a private security advisory in GitHub if enabled

## Supported Versions

We aim to support the latest main branch. Specify supported releases once we publish versions.

## Guidelines

- Do not publicly disclose before a fix is available.
- Provide clear reproduction steps and impact assessment.
